documents.document:
Spotting Fake Prada Sunglasses

Prada is one of the most-coveted brands in the fashion industry today. They may be costly but anyone who gets to wear a Prada does not only wear the brand but also prestige and glamour. Aside from bags, which are the most popular product of the brand, Prada sunglasses are also making a name of their own. We see lots of celebrities wearing Prada sunglasses – which is what makes this eyepiece wanted.

However, buying designer sunglasses these days have become more challenging with the emergence of online scammers as well as imitations. Imitators do a good job making copycats of the item that if you’re a first-time buyer, you’d hardly tell which one is real and which one is actually fake.

To help you spot fake Prada sunglasses, here are some tips for you to keep in mind.

Get into the details. First, genuine Prada sunglasses display the sunglass information on either of the inner temples. This information includes the model number, color, and the dimension. Some sunglasses display information but when you take a close look, you realize that these do not seem to match the sunglass model. Before you buy, make sure that every detail matches the sunglass model.

Get to the box. Authentic Prada sunglasses come with a box. The box is dark grey in color which looks like a shoe box. You will find the Prada logo printed on the middle while bar codes may be located at the bottom of the box. If your box seem to have gotten all these wrong, be wary as you could have gotten a fake one.

The casing. Inside the box, you’ll find the sunglass case. The case is made from leather but the inner material is suede. On top of the case, you should see the Prada logo, embossed, not printed. The case should also flip open, not zippers not buttons.

Examine the Prada cloth. Your complete kit should also come with a black microfiber cloth with a Prada logo in the middle. Its edges are now sewn neatly but rather jagged.

The certificate. Just like buying luxury bags, your Prada sunglasses should also come with a plastic authenticity card. The white card is contained in a small envelope.

Buying Prada sunglasses can be quite tricky, especially if it’s your first time. But understanding such details will help you land a genuine pair that’s worth keeping, wearing, and spending for.

Safety Precautions: How To Buy Sunglasses Online

Nowadays, more and more individuals are choosing the easy way when it comes to shopping. Gone are the days when they'll go as far as hopping from one store or mall to another. Even luxury items such as bags, gadgets, and cars can now be purchased through the Internet. Another hot item which is commonly searched for on online shops and auction shops is designer sunglasses. However, if you wish to buy sunglasses online, there are a few safety precautions that you have to keep in mind. Doing so will help you ensure that you don't fall into the hands of crooks who are just talking you into spending your money on nothing.

Be sure that you observe the following safety precautions when you buy sunglasses online:

Spotting the spammer. The only downside of online selling is that it is used by thieves to get as much money as they can from customers. It is important that you keep yourself well-versed with the red flags. For instance, if you find a Chanel sunglass sold at $50, think again. Chanel as well as other designer sunglasses range between $150- $500, depending on the model. More recent collection retail even higher. Before you get yourself in big trouble, make sure that you've conducted a quick background check on the seller. Check out comments from previous customers and call the contact number stated on the website.

Secured payment options. Fraud is rampant on the online marketplace. If you buy sunglasses online, your most convenient payment option would be paying through credit card, debit card or Paypal. Before you enter your financial details, make sure that you untick the box that retains information on your next visit. This can out you in serious financial trouble especially if you're using a public computer. Buyers are also advised to be cautious with regular deductions. For instance, if you're getting a product on installment, make sure that the charges will end on the last month of installment, as stated in the contract.

Detecting the fake. Another factor to watch for when you buy sunglasses online is the rampancy of fake items. On the photos, an item can look exactly like a real Chanel but when you receive your shipment, only then will you realize that you bought a fake.

Keep these safety tips in mind when you buy sunglasses online and save yourself from spending money on nothing.

Where To Buy Designer Sunglasses Australia

Men and women alike are making sunglasses as part of their everyday wardrobe, especially for those who live in sunny countries like Australia. But nowadays, people have gone a little picky. They no longer just settle for any type of sunglass, they choose designer sunglasses Australia.

Designer sunglasses Australia may be a littler more pricey than the generic brands but these sunnies are guaranteed to last for a longer time. You can pass them down to younger generations. More than just that, designer sunglasses Australia come with a element of glamour which you wear yourself along with your sunglasses. However, one of the biggest concerns among shoppers these days is the rampancy of fake sunglasses. Even in Australia, designer brand imitations are everywhere. So how do you ensure that you’re buying yourself a genuine model?

The answer is simple – buy only from trusted sellers like the following:

Straight from the shop. This may be the old school way of shopping but it saves you from the risks of spending your money on imitations. Check out the malls and for sure, there you’d find a Ray-Ban, Tom Ford, or at least an affiliated shop that sells your dream eyewear. Because most high-end designer shop found inside malls price their items at a higher range, it would be best if you window shop at least a few days or weeks before you buy. Check out different malls and different shops. You might also want to wait for sales to avail of great discounts.

Online shop. Another option would be to buy from an online website. However, don’t just give in to any online shop. Auction sites, for instance, like eBay is not always a good option. Instead, check out the official websites. Go directly to Chanel, Prada, Miumiu, or whatever brand you wish to buy. In most cases, you’ll have to pay for the shipping and the taxes but the good thing is that you’re sure that you’re spending your hard-earned money on authentic pieces that’s sure to last for a long time.

Be careful when buying designer sunglasses Australia. As much as possible, buy only from the above-mentioned shop options. They may not be relatively affordable but you know that you won’t have to regret about anything because you’re buying something that will give you a good value for your money.

So what are you waiting for? Buy designer sunglasses Australia now!

How To Buy Sunglasses Online For Your Kids

Most parents are unsure whether or not it’s okay to buy sunglasses online for the kids. Many think that it’s always better to tag them along to the store so that they can wear it right then and there and see whether it’s a good fit or not.

However, if you’re after your shopping convenience and savings, your best option would be to buy sunglasses online. Unlike traditional shopping, you won’t have to hop from one store to another until you find the perfect pair. In just a click, it allows you to visit one store to another, giving you the chance to choose only the best deal possible. So how do you make sure that you buy sunglasses online the right way? Here’s a quick guide for you to keep in mind.

Kid’s sunglasses are generic. Don’t worry; kids’ sunglasses usually come in a free size. This size fits a range of face sizes and shapes. Even if you don’t tag the kids along, you can still make sure that you’re buying the right size for him.

Choose. Because you chose to shop online, make the most out of this experience by visiting several sunglass stores. Don’t buy from the first site that you visit. Check out other online stores. As much as possible, buy only from the websites of direct manufacturers.

The specs. Some parents buy sunglasses online because they simply want something to make their kids look fashionable. But more than just that, you also have to review the specs. Is it capable of blocking the sun’s UV radiation?

Keep these tips in mind and buy the perfect pair of sunnies for your kids. If you buy sunglasses online, you don’t only get to check out a range of options, it also ensures that you have a convenient and satisfying shopping experience.

Fashion Must-Haves To Match With Your Sunglasses Australia

Nowadays, sunglasses Australia are no longer just seen as necessities. We don’t only wear them simply because we want to protect our vision from the harmful rays of the sun. It would be safe to say that in most cases, we buy sunglasses Australia because we want to look good and fashionable.

And in what ways can we look highly fashionable while wearing our sunglasses Australia? The technique is to match our pair of sunnies with a few fashion must-haves. Here are a few things that you’ve got to have in your closet.

Bikini. What better way to wear your sunglasses than with a sexy bikini? We all need sunglasses during summer, especially if we plan to get a tan by the shores of our favorite beach for hours. Buy a bikini that would best flaunt your figure. Remember that just because a one-piece looked hot on Kate Moss, it does not mean that it will look the same on you as well.

Jeans. Planning to run errands over the weekend? Don’t leave the house without your sunglasses Australia. And how do you make sure that you experience the utmost satisfaction that you need? Match your sunnies with a comfortable pair of jeans. With a nicely-fitted jeans, you’re guaranteed to move around at ease.

Scarf. If you’re traveling, what do you wear to protect yourself from the cold without looking like a college kid who could be lured by crooks? Simple – wear a scarf! And how do you add a dose of elegance and class to your travel outfit? – Match it with a pair of sunglasses. Cat-eye sunglasses as well as oversized sunglasses are bound to make you look chic.

Keep these tips in mind and look at your best throughout every season. Don’t forget to wear your sunglasses Australia to keep your vision protected from the harmful rays of the sun.

Online Sunglasses Australia: What Brands Can You Buy?

Today, many of us favor to purchase online sunglasses Australia instead of shopping the traditional way. This option is not only highly-convenient given the fact that it allows us to hop from one store to another in just a click, it is also very beneficial because it gives us the chance to choose the best possible deal in the market.

If you haven’t had the chance to experience buying online sunglasses Australia, now is the right time for you to check it out. Aside from the convenience, this way of shopping also offers everyone access to an array of luxury sunglass brands such as the following:

Ray-Ban. Ray-Ban is probably one of the most popular sunglass brands these days. They may relatively be priced lower than other luxury brands like Prada or Chanel, but this brand has taken the sunglass market a stir. Celebrities, men and women alike, wear their favorite Ray-Ban aviator and Wayfarers to ensure sun protection while looking stylish at the same time.

Chanel. For women who want to look classy and fine as Audrey Hepburn, the Chanel brand is probably the best sunglass line to choose. Chanel sunglasses exude a classic, simple, yet very elegant appeal. This eyepiece is famous among celebrities such as Paris Hilton, Nicole Richie, and other Hollywood socialites. Visit the Chanel website to check out a wide range of designs.

Tom Ford. For men and women who love the wear-anywhere-and-everywhere eyepiece, check out Tom Ford online sunglasses Australia. Tom Ford sunglasses come with a functional yet stylish design. It can be worn to different occasions. Jennifer Aniston and Courtney Cox are frequently photographed wearing a pair of Tom Ford sunnies.

You’re never going wrong with any of the above brands. So try shopping online sunglasses Australia from your favorite shops on the Internet and experience convenience like no other.

Where To Buy Designer Sunglasses In Paris

Paris is the fashion capital of the world and if you’re looking for a little splurge, we’ll teach you tips on where to buy designer sunglasses while you’re in this romantic city. Buying designer sunglasses can be a little risky. Some people, for instance, who buy this eyepiece online often, find themselves at the brink of spending their hard-earned money on replicas. While replicas look just like authentic ones, they’re not durable and they break easily. This could be easily avoided if you know exactly how and where to buy designer sunglasses.

So what designer sunglass brands should you consider when shopping in Paris? We’re listing down the crème of the crop. We’ll also let you know where to buy designer sunglasses in the heart of the city.

Chanel. Need we say more? Everybody loves Chanel. From royalties, celebrities, high-earning professionals, students – everyone wants to wear a pair of Chanel sunglasses. And where else is the best place to buy for Chanel than in Paris? Paris sells Chanel products at a relatively lower price as compared to other Chanel shops around the globe. You’re also most likely to see sales here than in any country. Head out to the nearest Chanel shop and check out their designer sunglasses. If you want to get the best rates, opt for styles of past seasons since they’re put on sale every time a season closes. So stop asking where to buy designer sunglasses, head out to Chanel and feast your eyes on a range of great deals.

Prada. Aside from Chanel, another must-check out brand is Prada. Prada is known as luxurious and high-end brand. It’s also commonly worn by today’s hottest celebrities. If Chanel is classic, Prada adapts to the current trends and is more likely to be a good option for stylish individuals who are looking for an edgy appeal. And where to buy designer sunglasses such as Prada in Paris? You’re bound to see several Prada stores in the city. And because there are lots to choose from, check out and compare the prices in order to land the best deal in the market.

Ray-Ban. Ray-Ban is an American brand but Europeans as well as citizens from all parts of the globe just can’t resist the charm of a pair of Ray-Ban. They’re edgy and they exude a fierce and rockstar appeal. Ray-Ban wayfarers may be a hit among young people but its classic aviators are also adored by people from all ages. If you’re in Paris, you’re also going to find several Ray-Ban shops.

Where to buy designer sunglasses in Paris? Now, you know exactly where to go. So look good and fashionable by wearing a pair of luxurious designer sunglasses.

Where To Buy Cheap Designer Sunglasses

Everyone wants to spend less. And when it comes to buying accessories, even fashionistas are rooting for the more affordable option – Cheap designer sunglasses. Many of us would think that a pair of Prada, Chanel, MiuMiu, Gucci, and Ray-Ban could cost us a fortune. But if you know exactly where to look for cheap designer sunglasses, you’re bound to save yourself a lot of money. The best part is that, you get to keep up with a stylish lifestyle without having to spend a lot.

But where exactly do you look for cheap designer sunglasses? While most of the hottest trends in sunglasses are sold in shops and malls, cheap designer sunglasses can be scored in other venues. Here are some marketplaces you might want to consider.

The Internet. Thanks to the Internet, everyone can now access a wide range of products sold from different parts of the world in just a click. One of the most convenient marketplaces that you might want to check out when buying cheap designer sunglasses is eBay, Craigslist, and Amazon. Independent sellers can sell a product 30% less than its original retail price.

When shopping for cheap designer sunglasses online, you’ll have to be mindful of a few precautions though. First, make sure that the item that you’re about to buy is authentic. A lot of crooks would sell fake cheap designer sunglasses. It’s always advised that you get hold of the seller’s contact number, talk to him through phone, and ask everything that you want to know about the particular product that you want to buy. Better yet, ask for a meet-up so that you’ll get a chance to check the sunglasses in person.

Clearance sales. You’re also bound to find a range of Cheap designer sunglasses at clearance sales. Although you’ll have to forget about getting the most recent trends and styles, this marketplace will help you save a lot of cash. For the best deals, buy vintage styles because they never run out of style.

Thrift shops. Another great venue for cheap designer sunglasses is thrift shops. It’s the haven for everything vintage. For a very affordable price, you can get a retro and vintage eyepiece. And these aren’t just any type of sunglass, these sunglasses come from luxury brands as well.

Garage sales. You can spot a pair of cheap designer sunglasses from a neighbor’s garage sale. Watch out for the sale schedules posted on social networking sites such as Twitter and Facebook, newspapers, as well as on bulletin boards.

Cheap designer sunglasses are everywhere. You just have to know how and where exactly to look for them. Be mindful of the above tips and scout the best deals in luxury eyewear.

Buying Sunglasses For Men

Whether it’s your anniversary, his birthday, or you simply just want your man to feel extra special, you buy him a present. Aside from the more common gifts such as perfume, shirts, shoes, what else can you give your partner that would make him feel truly special and adored? The answer – luxury sunglasses. Buying sunglasses for men can be a little tricky especially for women who are doing this for the first time. It’s not as easy as picking a shirt or a pair of shoes. You need to know what your man really looks for. And more than just style, it has to be functional as well.

We’re listing down some tips as well as brands to keep in mind when buying sunglasses for men.

Ray-Ban. One can never go wrong with Ray-Ban. It should be a priority consideration when thinking about buying sunglasses for men. Ray-Ban became popular in the mid 1900’s when it was made as the official eyewear for the American army. Since then, the brand has been associated to masculinity. It’s now the default sunglass among rock stars as well as women who want to channel an edgier look. There are two possible Ray-Ban options when buying sunglasses for men. It can be a classic Wayfarer or a pair of aviatiors. The Wayfarer is for individuals who are always on the go. It’s a good pair to wear for men who loves sports and the outdoors. The aviator, on the other hand, is for the city guy who loves spontaneity and a little glamor.

Persol. Abother brand to be highly considered when buying sunglasses for men is Persol. Persol is the combination of style and function. Every Persol sunglass is made by hand. It remains to be the only brand to use Meflecto, a flexible stem that ensures utmost comfort despite long hours of wearing the sunglass. The best thing about Meflecto is that it reduces the pressure one the face. The sunglasses are also made from natural colors and materials so you users don’t have to worry about allergies.

Rudy Project. When buying sunglasses for men, ask yourself first – is he an outdoor person? Rudy Project is the brand for men who love sports and the outdoors. They’re designed for extreme sports that will require wearers to stay for long hours under the sun. Rudy Project sunglasses will help ensure that you get protection that you need by blocking ultraviolet radiation. Your boyfriend is sure to enjoy wearing them while biking, sailing, running, hiking, or just about any outdoor sport that he pleases.

Now you know what to consider when buying sunglasses for men. Be mindful about these brands and make your partner truly happy.

How To Scout Sunglasses Discount On The Internet

Luxury sunglasses can be a little costly but because they offer one-of-a-kind quality and style, many people do not mind even if they have to spend a lot of cash on their favorite designers such as Chanel or Prada. Thank goodness for sunglasses discount, people from all around the world can get their dream sunnies for less. And how do you scout the best sunglasses discount on the Internet? Below are some tips for you to keep in mind.

Tip 1: Subscribe to brand newsletters. You can stay up-to-date with the latest craze. One way to do so is by subscribing to brand newsletters. If you subscribe to Chanel, you will be part of their priority list and you’ll get a notification about their latest discounts. This means, you have the best deals in sunglasses discount right at your fingertips – all the time.

Tip 2: Follow Twitter accounts of sunglass brands. Most of sunglass brands maximize social networking sites such as Facebook and Twitter to reach a huge market. You can use this to your advantage. Sunglass companies are sure to blow news on sunglass discounts through Twitter or Facebook so be sure that you follow the big names on Twitter and on Facebook.

Tip 3: Check out sunglass forums. Where else can you hear about the latest deals in sunglass discounts than from your fellow sunglass collectors? There are forums dedicated to luxury sunglasses on the Internet. Check these forums out from time to time and make yourself the first to know about sunglasses discount. Aside from talks about the prices, you’ll also get tips from members about the latest sunglasses trends. You’ll also scout tips about how to take care of your designer sunglasses.

Keep these three tips in mind and know where the best sunglasses discount is posted.

Why Is Rudy Project the Best Men Sunglasses

Looking for the perfect men sunglasses that you can give to your love one? There is a wide range of men sunglasses to choose from these days. They vary in prices, specific function, style, and brand. While most people do not pay enough attention to the specifications of a sunglass because they think that “sunglasses don’t differ a lot” anyway, the reality is that every pair of sunglass is different. When looking for the best sports men sunglasses, for instance, different band players come to surface but only one name conquers them all – Rudy Project.

Rudy Project has been one of the most sought-after men sunglasses brands. We’ve seen them worn by some of the world’s highly-renowned athletes and celebrities. So we ask, what makes Rudy Project one of the best men sunglasses brands for sports?

First and foremost, Rudy Project offers the topnotch protection that every man needs. If you’re always out of the sun for long hours, you need to keep your eyes protected from the harmful rays of the sun. Otherwise, you could suffer from eye diseases or ruin your vision. However, not everyone knows that every outdoor activity demands a specific caliber of protection. For instance, sailors need a different kind of protection from bikers or beachgoers. So, if you really want to ensure that you’ll get the exact protection that you need, better pick a Rudy Project sunglass that was made especially for your sport.

Second, Rudy Project combines style and function. Yes, they are made especially for athletes and sports enthusiasts who stay long house at the outdoors but don’t underestimate the aesthetics of a pair of Rudy Project. They don’t just offer exemplary function but also high-end class and style. After your sports commitment, Rudy Project users can use their sunnies as an accessory. It can be worn just like other fashion men sunglasses brands such as Ray-Ban. One can wear it to his usual routine – to errands, to the office, to business meetings, and to daily pastime.

Third, these men sunglasses are very durable. They may come with a price but you’re guaranteed to be able to wear your men sunglasses for a long period of time. A pair of Rudy Project can last for years and if you store and take good care of your sunglass properly, they’re bound to last even a little longer.

There are a lot of reasons why Rudy Project always comes out as one of the best men sunglasses not just for sports enthusiast but for style fanatics as well. The next time that you find yourself shopping for a durable and trusted pair of sunglasses, treat yourself to a Rudy Project men sunglasses.

Women Sunglasses Tips: What To Pair Your Sunnies In The Summ

Summer – what comes to mind? The beach would probably come in first. Then, bikinis, flip flops, reggae, and beer. For women who want to look at their best in every season, summer is the time of the year to head out to the beach and wear their bikinis and accessories. One of the most important accessories that every beach bum should have is women sunglasses.

women sunglasses may be commonly seen as a mere accessory, especially when modeled, by some of our favorite celebrities. But we should not forget the fact that we wear a sunglass not just for style; but most importantly, for sun protection. When we stay long hours in the outdoors, we could be sacrificing our good eyesight. The harmful rays coming from the sun can cause a wide range of diseases such as poor vision, cataracts, and if the problem gets worse, even blindness. Because of this, it’s always important that we wear women sunglasses especially during summer. Use your sunnies both as a functional and a style accessory. To help you come out as the season’s most in-demand beach bum, ramp off the beach shores by pairing your women sunglasses with the following.

A cute bikini. Summer is the perfect time of the year to flaunt our bikini bodies. So stop hiding and show them what you’ve got. Certain bikini cuts and style complement certain body types so if you want to look at your best, make sure that you pick a style that would best suit your body type. Of course, match your bikini with a nice pair of women sunglasses. It doesn’t matter what style you pick, the most important thing to keep in mind is that you’re sunglass comes with an incontestable protection.

A sundress. If you’re not too keen about wearing a bikini, you can wear a sundress to the beach. It can also serve as a cover-up which you can take off later on if you decide to take a plunge in the water. Again, the sunglass that you wear will have to depend on your personal style. If you feel like channeling a rock star at the beach, then go for a pair of Ray-Ban aviators. Ray-Ban offers women sunglasses in different shades. The Wayfarer would also make a good choice. However, if you’re feeling a little girly, go ahead and channel Viktoria Beckham and put on those oversized women sunglasses to wow everyone.

It does not matter what fashion pieces you match with your women sunglasses. The most important thing to consider is the protection that your sunglass can offer. Don’t just settle for a stylish piece, always check the specifications first and see if it can really protect your eyes even after long hours of staying under the sun.
